Class CipherBufferMutator

    • Method Detail

      • mutate

        public void mutate(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Description copied from interface: BufferMutator
        Mutates the data between buffer's position and limit. When this method has returned, buffer's position will be equal to its' limit.
        Specified by:
        mutate in interface BufferMutator
